sentences.english: Resins and gums are highly flammable.
sentences.chinese: 树脂和树胶也非常易燃。

sentences.english: It tumbled down through the bleeding tree and landed at our feet with a thud.
sentences.chinese: 它从满是树脂的树上跌下来，砰的一声落在我们脚前。

sentences.english: The products made from the two appropriative resins show excellent comprehensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 由该专用树脂制得的制品具有优良的综合性能。

sentences.english: This method doesn't work well on resin statues and artificial landscape rocks.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法并不好于树脂和人造景观石头雕像。

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenol resin is used as the linking mater ial in printing-inks.
sentences.chinese: 松香改性壬基酚醛树脂用于油墨连结料。

sentences.english: The humic acid resin was prepared using peat as material.
sentences.chinese: 利用泥炭为原料制备腐殖酸树脂。

sentences.english: The new box could be epoxied or screw attached into place.
sentences.chinese: 该新盒可以用用环氧树脂粘合或螺栓连接到位。

sentences.english: Chemical modification was carried out by the radical polymerization of KH-570 and acrylate monomer.
sentences.chinese: 改性后的树脂具有丙烯酸树脂和有机硅聚合物的优点。

sentences.english: Chemical modification was carried out by the radical polymerization of KH-570 and acrylate monomer.
sentences.chinese: 改性后的树脂具有丙烯酸树脂和有机硅聚合物的优点。

sentences.english: ABS resin is a kind of thermoplastic resin with excellent allround properties.
sentences.chinese: ABS树脂是一种综合性能优异的热塑性树脂。

sentences.english: ABS resin is a kind of thermoplastic resin with excellent allround properties.
sentences.chinese: ABS树脂是一种综合性能优异的热塑性树脂。

sentences.english: The new water-based mold coating for resin-bonded sand mold and core for aluminium castings has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 为铝铸件树脂砂型芯研制出新型的水基浅色涂料。

sentences.english: Synthetic resin of acrylate was prepared with solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用溶液聚合法制备丙烯酸酯合成树脂。

sentences.english: In irrigated desert soil, the economic benefit of resin coated urea application was superior to that of urea;
sentences.chinese: 灌漠土上施用树脂包衣尿素的经济效益好于普通尿素。

sentences.english: The product that combines aluminum and resin is non-breakable and light.
sentences.chinese: 该产品结合了铝和树脂是不易碎，重量轻。

sentences.english: The solubility of the resin depends on the critical balance of positively and negatively charged ions.
sentences.chinese: 树脂的溶解性取决于阴，阳离子的电平衡。
